Project description

Python bindings for ILM’s OpenEXR image file format.

To install this packge, make sure your system already has the OpenEXR libraryinstalled before.

If you detect any problem, please feel free to report the issue on the GitHubpage:

https://github.com/sanguinariojoe/pip-openexr/issues
